name: Patternis
description:
Patternis! It's a game in which you have to match a 3x3 block shape with the same exact shape on an upcoming grid. Sounds simple, but it can be quite challenging! The game is meant to be a relaxing experience, as the gameplay, visuals and music all play along to try and make you feel immersed.

  • 4 unique levels
  • Original soundtrack
  • Simple controls
  • VR support
  • Expressive and pleasant visuals
